Back: Are you sure you want to do this?
Kembali: Apakah Anda yakin ingin melakukan ini?

Back: Are you sure you want to revoke the user's tokens?
Please correct the password reset token.
Please specify the correct account and try again.
Kembali: Harap tentukan akun yang benar dan coba lagi.

Back: Your password reset link has expired.
Kembali: Tautan setel ulang sandi Anda telah kedaluwarsa.

Back: We're unable to send the password reset email.
Kembali: Kami tidak dapat mengirim email penyetelan ulang kata sandi.

Back: We'll email you a link to reset your password.
Kembali: Kami akan mengirimi Anda tautan email untuk menyetel ulang sandi Anda.

Back: You cannot delete your own account.
Kembali: Anda tidak dapat menghapus akun Anda sendiri.

Back: You have entered an invalid password for current user.
Kembali: Anda telah memasukkan kata sandi yang tidak benar untuk pengguna saat ini.

Back: We can't find a user to delete.
Kembali: Kami tidak dapat menemukan pengguna yang akan dihapus.
Pengguna ini sudah tidak ada lagi.

Back: You have revoked the user's tokens.
We can't find a user to revoke.
Kembali: Kami tidak dapat menemukan pengguna untuk mencabut.
Anda tidak dapat menghapus peran yang ditugaskan sendiri.

Back: An error occurred while deleting this role.
Kembali: Terjadi kesalahan saat menghapus peran ini.
Peran ini sudah tidak ada lagi.

Back: An error occurred while saving this role.
Kembali: Terjadi kesalahan saat menyimpan peran ini.

Back: A user with the same user name or email already exists.
Kembali: Pengguna dengan nama pengguna atau email yang sama sudah ada.

Back: Sorry, but this password has already been used. Please create another.
Kembali: Maaf, tapi kata sandi ini sudah pernah digunakan. Silahkan buat yang lain.

Back: You did not sign in correctly or your account is temporarily disabled.
Kembali: Anda tidak masuk dengan benar atau akun Anda untuk sementara dinonaktifkan.

Back: You need more permissions to access this.
Kembali: Anda memerlukan lebih banyak izin untuk mengakses ini.

Back: User Name is a required field.
Kembali: Nama pengguna adalah bidang wajib diisi.

Back: First Name is a required field.
Kembali: Nama Depan adalah bidang wajib diisi.

Back: Last Name is a required field.
Kembali: Nama Terakhir adalah bidang wajib diisi.

Back: Your password must be at least %1 characters.
Kembali: Kata sandi anda harus minimal %1 karakter.

Back: Your password must include both numeric and alphabetic characters.
Kembali: Kata sandi Anda harus menyertakan karakter numerik dan abjad.

Back: Your password confirmation must match your password.
Kembali: Konfirmasi kata sandi Anda harus sesuai dengan kata sandi Anda.

Back: It's time to change your password.
Kembali: Saatnya untuk mengubah kata sandi Anda.

Back: It's time to change your password.
Kembali: Saatnya untuk mengubah kata sandi Anda.

Back: Your password has expired; please contact your administrator.
Kembali: Kata sandi Anda sudah kadaluarsa; silahkan hubungi administrator anda.

Back: Enter your email address.  You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
Kembali: Masukkan alamat email Anda. Anda akan menerima email dengan link untuk mereset kata sandi Anda.

Back: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove this user from already assigned role\r\nAre you sure?
Kembali: Peringatan!\r\nTindakan ini akan menghapus pengguna ini dari peran yang telah ditetapkan\r\nApakah Anda yakin?

Back: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove those users from already assigned roles\r\nAre you sure?
Kembali: Peringatan!\r\nTindakan ini akan menghapus pengguna tersebut dari peran yang telah ditetapkan\r\nApakah Anda yakin?

Back: There was recently a request to change the password for your account.
Kembali: Baru-baru ini ada permintaan mengganti kata sandi untuk akun Anda.

Back: If you requested this change, reset your password here:
Kembali: Jika Anda meminta perubahan ini, setel ulang kata sandi Anda di sini:

Back: If you did not make this request, you can ignore this email and your password will remain the same.
Kembali: Jika Anda tidak mengajukan permintaan ini, Anda dapat mengabaikan email ini dan kata sandi Anda akan tetap sama.

Back: We have received a request to change the following information associated with your account at %store_name: %changes.
Kembali: Kami telah menerima permintaan untuk mengubah informasi berikut yang terkait dengan akun Anda di %store_name: %changes.

Back: If you have not authorized this action, please contact us immediately at %store_email
Kembali: Jika Anda belum mengizinkan tindakan ini, segera hubungi kami di %store_email

Back: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.
Kembali: Template email dipilih berdasarkan fallback tema saat opsi "Default" dipilih.

Back: Maximum Login Failures to Lockout Account
Kembali: Kegagalan Login Maksimum ke Akun Penguncian

Back: We will disable this feature if the value is empty.
Kembali: Kami akan menonaktifkan fitur ini jika nilainya kosong.

Back: The password for your account has been successfully changed.
Kembali: Kata sandi untuk akun Anda telah berhasil diubah.

Back: If you did not request this change, please contact us.
Kembali: Jika Anda tidak meminta perubahan ini, hubungi kami.

Back: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.
Kembali: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.

Back: The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.
Kembali: The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.

Back: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.
Kembali: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.

Back: More permissions are needed to access this.
Kembali: More permissions are needed to access this.

Back: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.
Kembali: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.

Back: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.
Kembali: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.

Back: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Kembali: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Kembali: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Kembali: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
